mapper.select: SELECT repaymentNo, bill_id, bill_no, repayment_user_id, repayment_user_name, repayment_time, online_pay_type, online_pay_amount, pre_deposit, total_repayment_amount, is_paid, interest_rate, total_interest_amount, create_time FROM bill_repayment_info WHERE repayment_no = #{repaymentNo}
